text.description: The question HTML text that comes before the options.

correctAnswers.description: A list of correct answers to the question. Each is an HTML string.

incorrectAnswers.description: A list of incorrect answers to the question. Each is an HTML string.

numberAnswers.description: The total number of answers in the list of possible answers.

minCorrectAnswers.description: The minimum number of correct answers in the list of possible answers.

maxCorrectAnswers.description: The maximum number of correct answers in the list of possible answers.
